ARTICLE_COBEM_TITLE: TABULAR PRIOR-DATA FITTED NETWORK FOR STRUCTURAL DAMAGE PREDICTION
ARTICLE_COBEM_DESC: Evaluation of the TabPFN algorithm for structural damage prediction. Results indicate excellent accuracy without hyperparameter tuning, outperforming traditional models, with potential for SHM.
UTC_DEGREE: Ingénieur en génie informatique spécialisé en IA
HOME_SUBTITLE: Developing AI and Automation solutions focusing on efficiency and systemic integration.
ABOUT ME:
Computer Engineering student focused on Artificial Intelligence and Automation. My approach combines the technical rigor of software with the physical understanding of hardware, seeking solutions that not only work in models but are efficient in execution.

At 18, I founded and managed my own clothing brand, an experience that gave me critical insight into financial viability and resource allocation. I decided to close operations to prioritize my technical education after analyzing that the opportunity cost outweighed immediate returns. Today, I apply this analytical and proactive mindset to develop intelligent systems that solve real problems.
